Appropriateness.Feedback: My students are undergrds, I want to reduce the involvement of math; and reduce ethical concerns, add more on on data and AI.

Structure.Feedback: I want to remove programming basics, delete ethics, add data-related topics, and relationship with AI.

Transparency of Policies.Feedback: Lack of ASU specific policies required here: https://policy.asu.edu/#doc1541231

Alignment.Feedback: Too abstract and technical in the beginning chapters, need examples and free of maths, should be mostly inspiring questions and examples

Accuracy.Feedback: No Recent neural network designs like transformers, U-nets, Diffusion models, etc.

Coherence.Feedback: The word using is a bit complicated - "encapsulates" etc is not something I would use in my class.

Engagement.Feedback: After a question, did not include discussions on the answer to it.

Variety.Feedback: Mostly multi-choice questions, did not have coding questions

Coherence.Feedback: Course objectives has ethical part covered (which I do not want to cover), syllabus weekly schedule does not have ethical part
